## Quaternion.toMatrix4x4() method

Convert this quaternion to a 4x4 rotation matrix.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toMatrix4x4(matrix?: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

matrix


</td><td>

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The output matrix, if not specified, a new matrix will be created.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)

The output matrix.

## Remarks

Only left top 3x3 part of the matrix will be changed.
